tool_description: An API showing all the latest coin news on Alltop, Coindesk, Finance.Yahoo & Bitcoin
name: coiner
title: coiner

api_list.name: bitcoin news media
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coiner.p.rapidapi.com/news/bitcoin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coiner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://coiner.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coiner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
